Harmonic content analysis of Volterra-series representable systems with Homophase Signals Decomposition

12 Jan 2020

  • Keywords :
    • Volterra series
    • Input-Output systems
    • Harmonic analysis
    • Nonlinearities
    • Homophase Signals
In addition to all the classical Fourier spectrum estimation tools, we develop here a method for analyzing the harmonic content in an adapted fashion for nonlinear systems, more precisely for dynamic systems that can be described with a Volterra series formalism. The methods presented here were issued in the context of the Voxline Audio - IRCAM collaboration centered on nonlinear characterization of loudspeaker prototypes.
